titles.title: A resolution recognizing that the San Antonio Spurs are the 2002-2003 National Basketball Association champions and congratulating the team for its outstanding excellence, discipline, and dominance.
A resolution recognizing that the San Antonio Spurs are the 2002-2003 National Basketball Association champions and congratulating the team for its outstanding excellence, discipline, and dominance.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)Congratulates the 2002-2003 San Antonio Spurs team and its coach, Greg Popovich, for winning their second National Basketball Association championship in five years.
